mapper.sql: id, business_type, business_name, name, cus_nums, business_start_time, business_end_time, mobile, xpoint, ypoint, location_area, address, tag, create_time, geohash, tuijian, dongjie, user_id, flag, logo, desc, device, sum_star, star_number, give_quan, pv
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tp_business_share where flag=1
and geohash LIKE #{geohash,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update tp_business_share
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_nums = #{cusNums,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
business_start_time = #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_end_time = #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xpoint = #{xpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ypoint = #{ypoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_area = #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
geohash = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tuijian = #{tuijian,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dongjie = #{dongjie,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device = #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum_star = #{sumStar,jdbcType=INTEGER},
star_number = #{starNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
give_quan = #{giveQuan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tp_business_share set business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_nums = #{cusNums,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, business_start_time = #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_end_time = #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, xpoint = #{xpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypoint = #{ypoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_area = #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, geohash = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tuijian = #{tuijian,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dongjie = #{dongjie,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logo = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum_star = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, star_number = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, give_quan = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pv = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update tp_business_share set tag = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{business_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update tp_business_share set give_quan = give_quan+1, where id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
